title: Total brand value major sports leagues ( NFL , MLB , NBA & NHL ) 2013
summary: This is a bar chart representing Sports League in the x axis and Brand value (in million U.S. dollars) in the y axis.
The maximum Brand value (in million U.S. dollars) 9131.8 is found at Sports League National Football League and the minimum is found at National Hockey League where Sports League is 1560.4.
The difference of Brand value (in million U.S. dollars) between the highest and lowest Sports League is 7571.4.
min_summary: This bar chart has 4 columns on the x axis representing Sports League, and Brand value (in million U.S. dollars) in each Sports League on the y axis.
The Brand value (in million U.S. dollars) is appeared to be the highest at Sports League National Football League and lowest at Sports League National Hockey League.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Sports League in the x axis and Brand value (in million U.S. dollars) in the y axis.
The maximum Brand value (in million U.S. dollars) 9131.8 is found at Sports League National Football League and the minimum is found at National Hockey League where Sports League is 1560.4.
The difference of Brand value (in million U.S. dollars) between the highest and lowest Sports League is 7571.4.
max_summary: This bar chart has 4 columns on the x axis representing Sports League, and Brand value (in million U.S. dollars) in each Sports League on the y axis.
The Brand value (in million U.S. dollars) is appeared to be the highest at Sports League National Football League and lowest at Sports League National Hockey League.
Sports League Major League Baseball has the second highest value for Brand value (in million U.S. dollars).
There is a difference of 7571.4 between the maximum Sports League National Football League and minimum Sports League National Hockey League.
Brand value (in million U.S. dollars) at Sports League National Football League is 9131.8 , second place is Major League Baseball at 4408.8, and thirdly is National Basketball Association at 2734.6.
The Sports League National Hockey League has 2.05 times less Brand value (in million U.S. dollars) than average.
Summing up the values of all Sports Leagues, we get total 17835.6.
